newsitem.title: UK: UK's SIB may need enhanced powers, chairman says.
newsitem.headline: UK's SIB may need enhanced powers, chairman says.

text.p: The new super Securities and Investments Board may need enhanced powers in order to be effective in future regulatory issues, SIB chairman Sir Andrew Large told an industry conference on Wednesday.
Chancellor of the Excheqer Gordon Brown announced last month that regulation of the UK financial industry would be brought under the umbrella of an enlarged SIB a so called super-SIB.
"Experience in the U.S. has shown that regulatory powers beyond the community of financial intermediaries can be helpful in enabling an adequate civil response to market abuses," Large said.
Large's term as chairman ends in July.
